mapper.sql:
COURSE_COMMENT.ID COURSECOMMENT_ID, COURSE_COMMENT.USER_ID COURSECOMMENT_USERID, COURSE_COMMENT.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID COURSECOMMENT_COURSETEMPLATEID, COURSE_COMMENT.TITLE COURSECOMMENT_TITLE, COURSE_COMMENT.CONTENT COURSECOMMENT_CONTENT,
COURSE_COMMENT.TOTAL_RATING COURSECOMMENT_TOTALRATING, COURSE_COMMENT.CONDITION_RATING COURSECOMMENT_CONDITIONRATING, COURSE_COMMENT.ATTITUDE_RATING COURSECOMMENT_ATTITUDERATING, COURSE_COMMENT.SATISFACTION_RATING COURSECOMMENT_SATISFACTIONRATING, COURSE_COMMENT.LAST_MODIFY_TIME COURSECOMMENT_LASTMODIFYTIME, COURSE_COMMENT.CREATE_TIME COURSECOMMENT_CREATETIME, COURSE_COMMENT.ENABLED COURSECOMMENT_ENABLED, COURSE_COMMENT.DELETED COURSECOMMENT_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into COURSE_COMMENT
USER_ID,
COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID,
TITLE,
CONTENT,
TOTAL_RATING,
CONDITION_RATING,
ATTITUDE_RATING,
SATISFACTION_RATING,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,

#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalRating,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{conditionRating,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update COURSE_COMMENT
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID = #{courseTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_RATING = #{totalRating,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CONDITION_RATING = #{conditionRating,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ATTITUDE_RATING = #{attitudeRating,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SATISFACTION_RATING = #{satisfactionRating,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from COURSE_COMMENT where DELETED = 0

SELECT
from COURSE_COMMENT where COURSE_COMMENT.DELETED = 0 and COURSE_COMMENT.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
